question: The "Roosevelt Range" is located in which territory?
explanation: Roosevelt Range, also known as the Roosevelt Mountain, is a mountain range located in the Peary Land region of Greenland, the autonomous territory of Denmark. This mountain range is a part of the Northeast Greenland National Park. It is the northernmost mountain range on earth. Helvetia Tinde is the highest peak of this mountain range which is 1929 metres above sea level.
